snippet.title: Hunt for man after street robbery
snippet.content: POLICE are searching for man allegedly involved in an armed robbery in Claremont last night. The man, aged in his 30s, is alleged to have used a knife to rob another man on Cadbury Rd about 6.35pm. Police would like to speak to anyone who saw a man of medium build, 175cm tall, with dark unshaven facial hair. He was wearing a dark hoodie with the hood over his head and dark trackpants. He also had a bandage on his left hand and was acting suspiciously. Anyone with information should contact the Glenorchy Police Station on 6173 2881 or 131 444 and quote OR568246. Information can also be provided anonymously by calling Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000 or online at crimestopperstas.com.au.
